original_text: The other lamb you shall offer at twilight. Like the grain offering of the morning, and like its drink offering, you shall offer it as a food offering, with a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
korean_text: 해 질 때에는 두 번째 어린 양을 드리되 아침에 드린 소제와 전제와 같이 여호와께 향기로운 화제로 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The other lamb you shall offer at twilight.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어린 양은 해 질 때에 드려야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Like the grain offering of the morning,
you shall offer it as a food offering,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것을 음식 제물로 드려야 하며,

sentences.original_text: with a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
